attributes.action: Posthumous George Crosses for Riot Victims
attributes.additional_details:
Haroon Jahan, Shazad Ali, Abdul Musavir and Richard Bowes died this week defending their communities.

These gentlemen have paid the ultimate price in their efforts to defend our communites and the british way of life. It is therefore imperative that the government recognise their sacrifice with a George Cross.

Gentlemen, we the undersigned, and your country salute you. May you rest in peace and rise in glory.

Thank You.
